item.title: A Fridge Odyssey
item.description: The fridge odyssey is an introspection of modernity through the lens of one of its most important landmark: the refrigerator. The lonely fridge of 124, Avenue de l’Hippodrome used Edward De Brouwer and Gauthier Fievet as new Moses to transcribe its hare-brained ideas into thermodynamical soundtracks. We won't be your frigo Modernity promise of progress is outdated. With no compass to rely on, we have to start challengin our relation to domination.

item.title: The Labyrinth
item.description: The labyrinth is a poem generator we designed with Giulia Lazzara during a stay in Athens in 2020. It’s a two player games whose rules are defined by the environment. Des méandres. Un chemin. Enchevêtrement de trajectoires linéaires résultant en une topologie planaire. Se chercher, se fuir. S’abriter, explorer. Tentative de sortie. Et la rassurante conclusion de son impossibilité. Et cette impression d’ensemble, juxtaposition des sens. Sens de la culture. Interprétation systématique.
